text: ["You Can't Hold Me Back" playing]

More than a month ago,
we started an important experiment.
An experiment to find out

whether really, really, really,
really hot people could find love too.
We made it tough for them,

banishing them
into a luxurious Spanish villa,

away from their regular gyms,
hairdressers, injectable nurses

and unable to post
to their legions of Instagram followers.
Today, I am delighted to report

that six young Aussie battlers
have survived these grueling conditions
and are ready to prove

that really, really, really,
really hot people can indeed find love.
Tonight, you will decide your winners.
Tonight, you will decide who wins $50,000.
Tonight, you are very welcome to the Love Island Australia grand finale.
[cheering]
Okay, we have a huge night ahead.
Who wants to meet our final three couples?
[cheering, applauding]
[Monk] Say hello to Claudia and Austen.
Madeline and Callum.
And Phoebe and Mitchell.
Whoo!
[cheering, whooping continue]
[song continues]
Your Love Island Australia grand finalists, everyone.
Now pay attention, Australia.

Claudia and Austen,
did you ever think you'd get this far?

-No. No way.
-God, no. No chance.

Claudia,
you were voted out the first night.

-I thought I was a goner.
-Yeah.

Are you kidding me?

-Yeah.

when Mitch asked me to be his girlfriend.
